headline: These Big Tech Stocks Are Cheaper than You Might Think Headed Into Earnings
summary: Nvidia  is one of those stocks.  Nvidia  is expected to report second-quarter earnings at the end of August, but investors could get a taste of demand for the company’s hardware as other tech companies report their AI spending plans in the weeks ahead.  Meanwhile, Nvidia investors have celebrated the stock’s comeback from April lows, with share now up 21% this year.

headline: Why Micron Stock Jumped 46% in the First Half of the Year
summary: The company is seeing strong growth in the data center segment.  Micron is in an advantageous position as the only memory chip manufacturer in the U.S.  AI and chip stocks have been among the winners this year, despite a crash in April following President Donald Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs announcement.

headline: Micron: Deutsche Bank bullish as current levels still offer ’attractive upside’
summary: Investing.com -- Deutsche Bank initiated coverage of Micron Technology (NASDAQ:MU) shares with a Buy rating and $150 per share price target in a note Thursday.

headline: CFRA Boosts Micron (MU) Target After Strong Earnings and Memory Growth Outlook
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) ranks among the 20 best fast growth stocks to invest in. Following better-than-expected quarterly results, CFRA maintained its Buy rating on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) and increased its price target from $117 to $155 on June 26.
